data.message: I just wanted to tell you, I absolutely HATE this update and what you did to my search bar. Why don't my suggestions come up and my search history is like 15 searches long before I get to my suggestions. It's just all wrong. I can't. I'm really sick of your mess

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Sha'Quila. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2dhTuk7. -Rhea

What is with this new thing that shows everyone you are online even if you have the chat off? I hate it. Can't figure out how to get it off?? I removed the msgr app and the facebook app and it is still showing up.
That link that was provided does not help make my experience more enjoyable too bad I can't tag @facebook
Ian's right u know, Facebook. Anonymity is safety.  Sometimes there are people hiding from psychotic hackers and government agencies.

We're sorry to hear you feel that way, Ian. Requiring people to use the name their friends and family know them by on Facebook helps keep our community safe. This way, you always know who you're connecting with. If there's anything you'd like for us to change, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2dk0Sv5. -Rhea

Rhea, Some of us do the opposite for safety, too. after all, not all of us have like-minded families. Whoever uses a pseudo or random username must be a blacksheep or a disillusioned person from his organization. It would be for the best interests of all to have the option of keeping their Pseudonyms or keeping their family names. I would click ur link, that is, if it is available in southeast asia. thank you for your time as well.
